messages.message:
Found something interesting on searching our GitHub repo from chrome omnibar

1. Go to <chrome://settings/?search=Manage+search+engines+and+site+search>
2. Activate GitHub search at the bottom
3. Edit the GitHub option in Site Search
    a. Link: https://github.com/search?q=repo%3Ainstabase%2Finstabase+%s
    b. Shortcut: "git"
    c. You can expand this to include other things like language
Now you can type "git " + <query> and that should directly query the repo
